content: Into to Comet smart contracts, deployments and configurator
name: Comet

steps.content: Compound III has an opinionated design that embeds security into its upgrade process. Upgradability with little restriction carries additional risk, like we have seen so far with Compound v2. All of the parameters of a deployment of Compound III are managed by a contract called the Configurator. This special contract deploys and sets all of the parameters for the instance. In order to change the core implementation of the protocol, the configurator contract must be redeployed, which should not be common.
